metadata.title: CVE-2017-14641 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in the AP4_DataAtom class inMetaData/Ap4MetaData.cpp in Bento4 version 1.5.0-617. The vulnerabilitycauses a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to remotedenial of service.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
